lead_paragraph: Jeni’s Splendid Ice Creams is destroying more than 265 tons of ice cream after listeria was found in the production facility and in products last week.

headline.print_headline: Contamination Causes Loss of $2.5. Million In Ice Cream
headline.main: Contamination Causes Loss of $2.5. Million in Ice Cream

snippet: Jeni’s Splendid Ice Creams is destroying more than 265 tons of ice cream after listeria was found in the production facility and in products last week.
